property.name: Rules
property.value: You may discard a Plains card rather than pay Abolish's mana cost. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As war raged on, the young mages became more direct in their tactics, often at great cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1Ć, Sacrifice a land: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Go ahead. Take it. You'll be so very powerful . . . and what harm can it do?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Doesn't look like much, does it?"—Alexi, zephyr mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Xą, Ċ, Discard two cards: Return X target creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Keldons didn't know her name, but they still cursed her in battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a land: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jamuraa's rhystic mages treat magic as their garden, uprooting unwanted spells as bothersome weeds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent controls seven or more lands, Avatar of Fury costs 6 less to cast. Flying ć: Avatar of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have 3 or less life, Avatar of Hope costs 6 less to cast. Flying Avatar of Hope can block any number of creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent controls at least four more creatures than you, Avatar of Might costs 6 less to cast. Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent has no cards in hand, Avatar of Will costs 6 less to cast. Flying

property.name: Rules
property.value: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, Avatar of Woe costs 6 less to cast. Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Ċ: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "Ċ: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wherever they went, the Keldons transformed the land into a weapon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fourth wind of ascension is Anointer, deifying the worthy."—Keld Triumphant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from white At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Bog Elemental unless you sacrifice a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the bog walks, the wise run."—Erissa, bog witch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Ċ, Sacrifice a land: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Branded Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land. Branded Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sword or the lash. Choose."—Akul, Keldon whip sergeant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Activated abilities of nontoken Rebels cost an additional "Sacrifice a land" to activate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They no longer care about their own suffering. Show them something worse."—Latulla, Keldon overseer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all enchantments you don't control. Then, if you control an untapped land, destroy all enchantments you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The chattering forest fell silent as the otherworldly song began.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Celestial Convergence enters the battlefield with seven omen counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an omen counter from Celestial Convergence. If there are no omen counters on Celestial Convergence, the player with the highest life total wins the game. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, the game is a draw.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ć: Regenerate Chilling Apparition. Whenever Chilling Apparition deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mortal minds shrivel at its touch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 0: Tap all lands you control. Chimeric Idol becomes a 3/3 Turtle artifact creature until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After a chimeric idol attacked them, the Keldons smashed all unfamiliar statues.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's end step, Citadel of Pain deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of untapped lands he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Battle is our religion. This fortress is our temple."—Latulla, Keldon overseer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a land: Coastal Hornclaw gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jamuraan farmers fear three things above all else: droughts, floods, and hornclaws.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice two lands: Return Coffin Puppets from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if you control a Swamp.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Ċ, Sacrifice X lands: Put X +1/+1 counters on Copper-Leaf Angel.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When Serra made angels, people called her a goddess. My angels are far superior to hers."—Latulla, Keldon overseer

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Darba unless you pay ĈĈ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Legend has it the darba gave up its wings in return for an extra stomach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Death Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, that creature's controller loses 2 life unless he or she pays 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It vents the chill of the grave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search target player's library for up to seven cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The third wind of ascension is Eliminator, clearing Keld's path to victory."—Keld Triumphant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing could grow where the vile smoke had been, and no one could breathe it and live.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Devastate deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You're willing to die for your homeland. I'm willing to kill for it."—Latulla, Keldon overseer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To outrace the griffin—Kipamu expression meaning"to do the impossible"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, its controller puts a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield. Whenever a nontoken creature leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens with the same name as that creature. When Dual Nature leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens put onto the battlefield with Dual Nature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player puts a green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield. Those creatures have "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard."

property.name: Rules
property.value: 4: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Any player may activate this ability but only any time he or she could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can block any number of creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tell me again," said Latulla, raising her fist, "how just one woman held back an entire Keldon platoon."

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are secrets out there begging to be rediscovered. We just need to look in the right places."—Teferi, planeswalker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target attacking creature unless its controller pays X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Creation is no great feat. Anything you make, I can unmake in a heartbeat."—Alexi, zephyr mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a land: Fault Riders gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They turn geological upheaval into tactical advantage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fen Stalker has fear as long as you control no untapped lands. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As silent as a shadow, and just as hard to flee.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Fickle Efreet attacks or blocks, flip a coin at end of combat. If you lose the flip, an opponent gains control of Fickle Efreet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may discard a Mountain card rather than pay Flameshot's mana cost. Flameshot deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards a card at random. Then that player discards another card at random unless he or she pays 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Keldons would never admit it, but Greel unsettles them, too.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "Ċ: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some lands are soothing, and their peace can be felt in the soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may discard an Island card and another card rather than pay Foil's mana cost. Counter target spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a land card from your graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion. 3: Until end of turn, Glittering Lion loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion." Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx. 2: Until end of turn, Glittering Lynx loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx." Any player may activate this ability.

property.value: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Greel's grin is far less loathsome than his touch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: XĆ, Ċ, Discard two cards: Target player discards X cards at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You're Latulla's gift to me, and I always play with my presents."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gulf Squid enters the battlefield, tap all lands target player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If it could capture the power it wastes, it would be invincible.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hazy Homunculus is unblockable as long as defending player controls an untapped land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They hide in dreams and whispers and faraway thoughts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Heightened Awareness enters the battlefield, discard your hand. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It startles me how alive one feels on the edge of death."—Barrin, master wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hollow Warrior can't attack or block unless you tap an untapped creature you control not declared as an attacking or blocking creature this combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though it moves like a living thing, anyone can tell it lacks a soul—not to mention mercy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Then he or she puts X 1/1 black Minion creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inflame deals 2 damage to each creature dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wound, maim, kill: it's all the same to a Keldon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice two lands: Jeweled Spirit gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As he knows all the world completely, the world refuses him harm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enchant creature 1Ĉ: Regenerate enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "War destroys; nature renews." —Jolrael, empress of beasts

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2Ĉ, Ċ, Discard two cards: All lands target player controls become 3/3 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I need no army. I have Jamuraa."

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Sacrifice two lands: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fields can be replanted. Settlements can be rebuilt. Burn it all."—Latulla, Keldon overseer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Keldon Battlewagon can't block. When Keldon Battlewagon attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat. Tap an untapped creature you control: Keldon Battlewagon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the power of the creature tapped this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Keldon Berserker attacks, if you control no untapped lands, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They fight beyond thought, beyond fear, and beyond mercy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Keldon Firebombers enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices all lands he or she controls except for three.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there isn't enough of Jamuraa left to stand on, I will still claim it for Keld."—Latulla, Keldon overseer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to defending player, you may destroy target artifact that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trod on by a gargadon—Kipamu expression meaning"wiped out"

property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 5/6 green Treefolk creature that's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldons were accustomed to rugged terrain, but they never expected it to be aggressive.

property.value: 2ĄĄ, Ċ, Discard two cards: Destroy all creatures except for Mageta the Lion. Those creatures can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Lion roars, his cubs grow stronger.—Kipamu saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lands target player controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scent of magic can rob you of your senses, blinding you to the world.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though a powerful constrictor, it prefers simply to drown its prey.

property.value: Mercenary Informer can't be the target of black spells or abilities from black sources. 2Ą: Put target nontoken Mercenary on the bottom of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The problem with rebels is that they so quickly reject authority.

property.value: Ċ, Sacrifice Mine Bearer: Destroy target attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Keldons may have explosive tempers, but I have explosives."

property.name: Rules
property.value: All combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn by target unblocked creature is dealt to its controller instead.

property.value: "Enemies can be your weapons or your shields. Simply show them which they are."—The Teachings of Zho

property.name: Rules
property.value: You can't untap more than one land during your untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cities have crumbled under its weight.

property.value: Ć: Nakaya Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn unless any player pays 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made strong by reckless magic. Made horrid by reckless strife.

property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "Ċ: This land deals 1 damage to each creature and each player."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ultimately, it became a three-way battle: the land attacked both armies.

property.value: You may discard a Swamp card rather than pay Outbreak's mana cost. Choose a creature type. All creatures of that type get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player puts a nontoken creature onto the battlefield, that player returns a land he or she controls to its owner's hand.

property.value: The Kipamu League knew what Keld refused to acknowledge: the land could support no more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.

property.value: Sometimes everyone decides to go for help at the same time.

property.value: As the strange plague ravaged Jamuraa, the fiends multiplied.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.

property.value: "The second wind of ascension is Reaver, slaying the unworthy."—Keld Triumphant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled. At the beginning of the next end step, if you haven't cast the card, return it to its owner's hand.

property.value: As a rite of passage, Kipamu youths taunt razorbacks with long sticks . . . then flee.

property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) 4: Return Quicksilver Wall to its owner's hand. Any player may activate this ability.

property.value: "Ogg hit wall. Ogg no kill wall. Ogg hate wall"

property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays X, where X is its converted mana cost.

property.value: "Are you sure you want to do that?"

property.value: Whenever one or more creatures attack you, if Reveille Squad is untapped, you may untap all creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To arms To arms The Lion roars"

property.value: Ċ: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color to your mana pool unless any player pays 1. Activate this ability only any time you could cast an instant.

property.value: "All mages dip into the same well; some are just in more of a hurry."—Alexi, zephyr mage

property.value: The circle buys time—an important commodity in battle.

property.value: ą: Tap target creature unless its controller pays 1.

property.value: "I'll rain down on you with the power of magic itself. Then we'll see who prevails."—Alexi, zephyr mage

property.value: Rhystic Lightning deals 4 damage to target creature or player unless that creature's controller or that player pays 2. If he or she does, Rhystic Lightning deals 2 damage to the creature or player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards. Then, if any player pays 2, discard three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The trick is to ask when no one's listening." —Alexi, zephyr mage

property.value: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn. They get an additional +0/+2 until end of turn unless any player pays 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A shield for one is good. A shield for everyone is even better.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Friends teach what you want to know. Enemies teach what you need to know.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unless target player pays 3, he or she loses 5 life and you gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jamuraan wizards are linked together by magic, a bond that only the wicked dare exploit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unless any player pays 2, search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Any lock can be undone, any secret revealed.

property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everything it sees it considers food—and with that many eyes, it's not liable to miss much.

property.value: Flying 2: Ribbon Snake loses flying until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All snakes slither. Only this one soars.

property.value: ć: Ridgeline Rager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While armies battled across Jamuraa, beasts stalked the high places looking for victims.

property.value: Mercenaries don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.value: The Vintara Forest welcomes its enemies with a crushing embrace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Our war is against suffering, not against those who cause it.—Samite creed

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scoria Cat gets +3/+3 as long as you control no untapped lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a volcano, it too can erupt without warning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reorder your graveyard at random. An opponent chooses a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, exile it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no rest for a Keldon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Searing Wind deals 10 damage to target creature or player.

property.value: "The first wind of ascension is Forger, burning away impurity."—Keld Triumphant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Basic lands each player controls have shroud as long as that player controls three or fewer lands. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It matters not if the gods hear my prayers. Jamuraa does."

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2Ą: The next time target attacking creature would deal combat damage to Shield Dancer this turn, that creature deals that damage to itself instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The harder your strike, the stronger her defense.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Shrouded Serpent attacks, defending player may pay 4. If he or she doesn't, Shrouded Serpent is unblockable this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many travelers have wandered into a fog only to find that it had teeth, claws, and an appetite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Silt Crawler enters the battlefield, tap all lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If they could replenish the land instead of draining it, Jamuraa would be teeming with them.

property.value: You may discard a Forest card rather than pay Snag's mana cost. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by unblocked creatures this turn.

property.value: Whenever Soul Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, you gain 2 life unless that creature's controller pays 2.

property.value: She seeks the warmth of the living.

property.value: Everyone is manipulated. It's just more obvious with the dead.

property.value: The end of one life is merely the beginning of thousands more.

property.value: Grapplers hunt in packs, driving their victims over steep mountain cliffs.

property.value: When eagles leave the sky, sailors leave the sea.

property.value: The land is heavy with promise, the harvest ripe with betrayal.
